Beacon App
Development

Connect Your Devices with the Data for Particular Location
Develop a Beacon App for Your Business Potential with the Devine Globe Team

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row enable_grid_lines=”” enable_skewed_section_effect=”yes” skewed_section_effect_top=”yes” skewed_section_effect_top_directions=”left-down-right” css=”.vc_custom_1592499817094{margin-right: 6% !important;margin-left: 6% !important;}” simple_background_color=”#f7f8f9″][vc_column][vc_row_inner enable_grid_lines=””][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”7/12″ css=”.vc_custom_1592499954083{margin-top: -48% !important;}”]
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row enable_grid_lines=””][vc_column el_class=”benefits-of-using”][vc_empty_space height=”40px”]

Let’s Converse

Many enterprise and small businesses are enabling beacon technology to improve their customer experience. Developing the Beacon app will help to promote the business leads effectively. The Devine Globe offers you a better service on the personalized shopping experience and increases the interaction with your customers.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row enable_grid_lines=””][vc_column el_class=”page-benefits-of-using”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”]

Benefits of Using an Beacon Application

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” row_content_width=”grid” enable_grid_lines=”” css=”.vc_custom_1592155729146{margin-top: 50px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-12 vc_col-md-12″][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” enable_grid_lines=””][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Improves Advertising Attention” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:22px|text_align:left” google_fonts=”font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” el_class=”benifits-main-title”][vc_column_text]Easy to create a attention for your customers through the Beacon technology as it targets in a specific location.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Easy to Adopt” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:22px|text_align:left” google_fonts=”font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” el_class=”benifits-main-title”][vc_column_text]The adoption of this technology is easier with the Devine Globe Team. It will be most convenient to approach and use.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Boosts the Power of Personalization” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:22px|text_align:left” google_fonts=”font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” el_class=”benifits-main-title”][vc_column_text]Following the Data with specific sharing for the customers will help to increase the business revenue.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Increases App Engagement and Retention” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:22px|text_align:left” google_fonts=”font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” el_class=”benifits-main-title”][vc_column_text]The following app will allow retaining the customers and increase the potential of your business strategy.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Provides Insightful Data” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:22px|text_align:left” google_fonts=”font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” el_class=”benifits-main-title”][vc_column_text]Beacon technology will provide insightful information for your business to improve customer requirements.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” row_content_width=”grid” enable_grid_lines=””][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-12 vc_col-md-12″][vc_empty_space height=”100px”]

Services Provided

[vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” enable_grid_lines=”” el_class=”benefits-using-icon”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1592071033358{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Beacon Enterprise App Development” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:22px|text_align:left” google_fonts=”font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” el_class=”benifits-main-title”][vc_column_text]Improve your Enterprise connectivity with the Devine Globe Team. We used to develop enterprise apps vice versa will help to control the customer interaction by developing your Beacon Enterprise App.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Beacon App Development for Small Business” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:22px|text_align:left” google_fonts=”font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” el_class=”benifits-main-title”][vc_column_text]You might run a small business but looking to generate lead and interaction hence to make use of the beacon app will be a better choice and option for the data sharing, do not wait too long.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Beacon Mobile App Customization” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:22px|text_align:left” google_fonts=”font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” el_class=”benifits-main-title”][vc_column_text]Those who prefer to customize the Beacon app can approach us to develop a progressive app for your business. We have an experienced developer who used to focus highly on your app recommendation.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Beacon Mobile App Maintenance” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:22px|text_align:left” google_fonts=”font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” el_class=”benifits-main-title”][vc_column_text]The Devine Globe also help you your business by maintaining the beacon app and improve the sustainability constantly[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Beacon App Consultation” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:22px|text_align:left” google_fonts=”font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” el_class=”benifits-main-title”][vc_column_text]Our experienced developers are available to serve your doubts regarding beacon technology and also focus on your business needs via the beacon app.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1592071045810{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”]

The timeline will be perfect.
